    Pool.withTransaction(io.vertx.sqlclient.TransactionPropagation txPropagation, Function<SqlConnection,io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<T>> function)
    Like Pool.withTransaction(java.util.function.Function<io.vertx.mutiny.sqlclient.SqlConnection, io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<T>>) but allows for setting the mode, defining how the acquired connection is managed during the execution of the function.
